section.title: Description
section.p: This construct is meant to convey that the Orderable Pharmacy Item is a code (more specifically, an RxNorm code). Since the code is in effect a pointer to a particular product, the association and the code are performing the same function.
The Common Product package contains medications and devices
We need to be able to track when a record was exceprted from or derived from another record. This things could be handled by the Medical Record Provenance
